text: Bandeirante Esporte Clube, or simply Bandeirante, is a Brazilian football team based in Birigui, São Paulo. Founded in 1965, it plays in Campeonato Paulista Segunda Divisão. ==History== The club was founded on March 11, 1923. They won the Campeonato Paulista Segunda Divisão in 1963, the Campeonato Paulista Série A2 in 1986 and the Copa Coca-Cola de Futebol in 2001. ==Achievements== * Campeonato Paulista Série A2: ** Winners (1): 1986 * Campeonato Paulista Segunda Divisão: ** Winners (1): 1963 * Copa Coca-Cola de Futebol: ** Winners (1): 2001 ==Stadium== Bandeirante Esporte Clube play their home games at Estádio Pedro Marin Berbel. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 10,012 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 1965 Category:Football clubs in São Paulo (state) Category:1965 establishments in Brazil
title: Bandeirante Esporte Clube
